How to mine 2 oak logs in Minecraft?: Answer: To mine 2 oak logs in Minecraft, you will need to locate oak trees in your world first. Use a wooden axe, stone axe, iron axe, diamond axe, or netherite axe to break the oak logs. Each block takes approximately 2-3 seconds to break with the appropriate tool.
How to mine 5 cobblestones in Minecraft?: Answer: To mine cobblestone in Minecraft, you need to find a stone block or boulder, then use a pickaxe to mine it. Each block will drop one cobblestone when mined. So, you will need to mine at least five stone blocks to obtain 5 cobblestones.
How to craft a wooden pickaxe in Minecra: Answer: To craft a wooden pickaxe in Minecraft, you will need three wooden planks and two sticks. Arrange these materials in a crafting table in the following pattern: place the three wooden planks across the top row and the two sticks in the middle column, leaving the bottom row empty. This will result in a wooden pickaxe.
How to mine 3 oak logs in Minecraft?: Answer: To mine 3 oak logs in Minecraft, you need to first find an oak tree in the game. Once you locate the tree, use a wooden axe, stone axe, iron axe, diamond axe, or netherite axe to chop the tree down. Each time you chop a section of the tree, you will obtain oak logs. Repeat this process until you have acquired 3 oak logs.
How to mine 4 clay blocks in Minecraft?: Answer: To mine 4 clay blocks in Minecraft, you will need a shovel. Locate a body of water (clay can be found at the bottom of rivers, ponds, or oceans), then use the shovel to mine the clay blocks. Each clay block will drop one clay item when mined.
How to mine 3 cobblestone blocks in Mine: Answer: To mine 3 cobblestone blocks in Minecraft, you will need a pickaxe. Approach a stone block and start mining it by holding down the left mouse button until it breaks and drops cobblestone. Repeat this process two more times on nearby stone blocks to gather a total of 3 cobblestones.
How to mine 2 wood logs in Minecraft?: Answer: To mine 2 wood logs in Minecraft, you will need to find a tree with at least 2 wood blocks connected to each other. Use an axe to chop down the wood blocks, and they will drop as items that you can pick up.
How to mine 3 cobblestones in Minecraft?: Answer: To mine 3 cobblestones in Minecraft, you first need to find a block of stone (gray block) in the game. Then, using a pickaxe (wooden, stone, iron, etc.), simply break the stone block by left-clicking on it until you have mined 3 cobblestones. Each time you break a stone block, it will drop one cobblestone.
How to craft 4 oak planks in Minecraft?: Answer: To craft 4 oak planks in Minecraft, you would need to place one oak log in a crafting grid and it will turn into 4 oak planks.
How to mine 4 cobblestones in Minecraft?: Answer: To mine cobblestone in Minecraft, you need to find a stone block and use a pickaxe (wooden, stone, iron, diamond, or netherite) to mine it. Each block of stone that you mine will drop one cobblestone. Simply repeat this process 4 times to gather 4 cobblestones.
How to mine 2 cobblestones in Minecraft?: Answer: To mine 2 cobblestones in Minecraft, you will need to use a pickaxe on stone blocks. Each time you mine a stone block, it will drop a cobblestone block.
How to craft a stone axe in Minecraft?: Answer: To craft a stone axe in Minecraft, you will need two sticks and three pieces of stone. Place the two sticks vertically in the center of the crafting grid, then place the three stone pieces across the top row of the grid. This will create a stone axe that you can use for various tasks in the game.

How to mine 2 coppers in Minecraft?: Answer: To mine copper in Minecraft, you need to have a stone pickaxe or higher. Locate copper ore in the world, mine the copper ore blocks with the pickaxe, and then smelt the copper ore in a furnace to get copper ingots. Each copper ore block will yield one copper ingot when smelted.
How to mine 2 irons in Minecraft?: Answer: To mine 2 iron ore in Minecraft, you will need a stone pickaxe or higher. Locate a vein of iron ore in the underground mine, usually found at lower levels in the game. Use the pickaxe to mine the iron ore blocks, which will drop as items once broken. Collect the iron ore by walking over or right-clicking on them. Repeat the process until you have gathered 2 iron ore pieces.
How to mine 1 lapis in Minecraft?: Answer: To mine 1 lapis lazuli ore block in Minecraft, you will need an iron pickaxe or a pickaxe made of a higher-tier material like diamond. Simply mine the lapis lazuli ore block by right-clicking on it with the pickaxe until it breaks and drops the lapis lazuli item.
How to craft a furnace in Minecraft?: Answer: To craft a furnace in Minecraft, you will need 8 blocks of cobblestone. Place the cobblestone blocks in a 3x3 crafting grid, leaving the center block empty. This will create a furnace that can be used for smelting ores, cooking food, and more.
How to mine 3 coal in Minecraft?: Answer: To mine 3 coal in Minecraft, you will need a pickaxe. Locate a coal ore block in a cave or underground, then use the pickaxe to mine the coal ore. Each coal ore block drops coal when mined, and typically one block yields 1-2 coal. So, you may need to find multiple coal ore blocks to gather 3 coal. Be cautious of any hostile mobs in the area while mining.
How to smelt 2 raw iron in Minecraft?: Answer: To smelt 2 raw iron in Minecraft, you would need to place the raw iron ore in a furnace along with some fuel such as coal, charcoal, or wood planks. The furnace will then heat up and process the raw iron ore into iron ingots.
How to craft 1 stone axe in Minecraft?: Answer: To craft a stone axe in Minecraft, you will need two sticks and three pieces of stone. Place the sticks in a vertical line in the middle column of the crafting grid, and then place a piece of stone in the top row and another in the center square of the middle row. This will create a stone axe for you to use in the game.
